Package ohos.media.common.sessioncore

Class AVPlaybackState.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.common.sessioncore.AVPlaybackState.Builder
  • Enclosing class:

    public static final class AVPlaybackState.Builder
extends Object
    A static inner class of AVPlaybackState to construct instances.

    • Method Detail

      • setAVPlaybackState

        public AVPlaybackState.Builder setAVPlaybackState​(int state,
                                                  long position,
                                                  float speed,
                                                  long updateTime)
        Sets the playback state, including the position, speed, and position update time.

        If the position is unknown, use AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_POSITION_ERROR; otherwise, specify the position update time.

        Parameters:
        state - Indicates the state. Available states are as follows:
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_NONE
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_STOPPED
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_PAUSED
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_PLAYING
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_FAST_FORWARDING
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_REWINDING
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_BUFFERING
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_ERROR
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_CONNECTING
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_SKIPPING_TO_PREVIOUS
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_SKIPPING_TO_NEXT
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_SKIPPING_TO_QUEUE_ITEM
        position - Indicates the current playback position (milliseconds).
        speed - Indicates the current playback speed.
        updateTime - Indicates the position update time.
        Returns:
        Returns this Builder instance.
        Since:
        3

      • setAVPlaybackState

        public AVPlaybackState.Builder setAVPlaybackState​(int state,
                                                  long position,
                                                  float speed)
        Sets the playback state, including the position and speed.
        Parameters:
        state - Indicates the state. Available states are as follows:
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_NONE
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_STOPPED
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_PAUSED
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_PLAYING
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_FAST_FORWARDING
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_REWINDING
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_BUFFERING
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_ERROR
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_CONNECTING
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_SKIPPING_TO_PREVIOUS
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_SKIPPING_TO_NEXT
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_SKIPPING_TO_QUEUE_ITEM
        position - Indicates the current playback position (milliseconds).
        speed - Indicates the current playback speed.
        Returns:
        Returns this Builder instance.
        Since:
        3

      • setAVPlaybackActions

        public AVPlaybackState.Builder setAVPlaybackActions​(long actions)
        Sets the actions supported by this AVSession instance. Available actions are as follows:
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_STOP
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_PAUSE
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_PLAY
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_REWIND
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_SKIP_TO_PREVIOUS
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_SKIP_TO_NEXT
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_FAST_FORWARD
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_SET_RATING
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_SEEK_TO
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_PLAY_PAUSE
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_PLAY_FROM_MEDIA_ID
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_PLAY_FROM_SEARCH
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_SKIP_TO_QUEUE_ITEM
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_PLAY_FROM_URI
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_PREPARE
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_PREPARE_FROM_MEDIA_ID
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_PREPARE_FROM_SEARCH
        • AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_ACTION_PREPARE_FROM_URI
        Parameters:
        actions - Indicates the actions supported.
        Returns:
        Returns this Builder instance.
        Since:
        3

      • addAVPlaybackCustomAction

        public AVPlaybackState.Builder addAVPlaybackCustomAction​(String action,
                                                         String name,
                                                         int icon)
        Adds a custom action. You can specify the action ID, display name, and icon ID.
        Parameters:
        action - Indicates the ID of the action.
        name - Indicates the display name of the action.
        icon - Indicates the ID of the icon to be displayed for the action.
        Returns:
        Returns this Builder instance.
        Since:
        3

      • setAVPlaybackErrorMessage

        public AVPlaybackState.Builder setAVPlaybackErrorMessage​(CharSequence error)
        Sets the message displayed when an error occurs during playback. This method must be used when the state is AVPlaybackState.PLAYBACK_STATE_ERROR.
        Parameters:
        error - Indicates the error message.
        Returns:
        Returns this Builder instance.
        Since:
        3
